verses.verse: Then Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Re'uvenites <S%H7206><s%>, and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Ye have kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all that Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you, and have obeyed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> in all that I commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you:

Ye have not left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> these many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, but have kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the Mitzvah <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And now the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath given rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto your brethren <S%H251><s%>, as he promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them: therefore now return <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye, and get <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> you unto your tents <S%H168><s%>, and unto the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H272><s%>, which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>.

But take diligent <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the Mitzvah <S%H4687><s%> and the Torah <S%H8451><s%>, which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you, to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and to cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto him, and to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>.
So Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, and sent them away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>: and they went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto their tents <S%H168><s%>.

Now to the one half <S%H2677><s%> of the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> possession in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>: but unto the other half <S%H2677><s%> thereof gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>. And when Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> sent them away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> also unto their tents <S%H168><s%>, then he blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them,

And he spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with much <S%H7227><s%> riches <S%H5233><s%> unto your tents <S%H168><s%>, and with very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%>, with silver <S%H3701><s%>, and with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and with brass <S%H5178><s%>, and with iron <S%H1270><s%>, and with very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%> raiment <S%H8008><s%>: divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with your brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> out of Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the country <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, to the land <S%H776><s%> of their possession <S%H272><s%>, whereof they were possessed <S%H270><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And when they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the borders <S%H1552><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, that are in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%> by Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, a great <S%H1419><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> to see to <S%H4758><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> have built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, in the borders <S%H1552><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, at the passage <S%H5676><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of it, the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8735><s%> at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, to go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> against them.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, into the land <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, Pinchas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>,

And with him ten <S%H6235><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%>, of each <S%H259><s%> <S%H259><s%> chief <S%H5387><s%> <S%H5387><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> a prince <S%H1><s%> throughout all the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and each one <S%H376><s%> was an head <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> among the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, and they spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, What trespass <S%H4604><s%> is this that ye have committed <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, to turn away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, in that ye have builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> you an altar <S%H4196><s%>, that ye might rebel <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%> ?

Is the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%> too little <S%H4592><s%> for us, from which we are not cleansed <S%H2891><s%> <S%H8694><s%> until this day <S%H3117><s%>, although there was a plague <S%H5063><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>,

But that ye must turn away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>? and it will be, seeing ye rebel <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that to morrow <S%H4279><s%> he will be wroth <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Notwithstanding <S%H389><s%>, if the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H272><s%> be unclean <S%H2931><s%>, then pass ye over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, wherein the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and take possession <S%H270><s%> <S%H8734><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> us: but rebel <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not against the YY <S%H3068><s%>, nor <S%H408><s%> rebel <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against us, in building <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> you an altar <S%H4196><s%> beside <S%H1107><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Did not Achan <S%H5912><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> commit <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> in the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%>, and wrath <S%H7110><s%> fell <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>? and that man <S%H376><s%> perished <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not alone <S%H259><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>,

The YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> of 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> of 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> he shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; if it be in rebellion <S%H4777><s%>, or if in transgression <S%H4604><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>, (save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us not this day <S%H3117><s%>,)

That we have built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> us an altar <S%H4196><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, or if to offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thereon burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, or if to offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> thereon, let the YY <S%H3068><s%> himself require <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it;

And if we have not rather done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it for fear <S%H1674><s%> of this thing <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, In time to come <S%H4279><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> might speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto our children <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What have ye to do with the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> a border <S%H1366><s%> between us and you, ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> and children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>; ye have no part <S%H2506><s%> in the YY <S%H3068><s%>: so shall your children <S%H1121><s%> make <S%H7673><s%> our children <S%H1121><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from <S%H1115><s%> fearing <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore we said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let us now prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> us an altar <S%H4196><s%>, not for burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, nor for sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>:

But that it may be a witness <S%H5707><s%> between us, and you, and our generations <S%H1755><s%> after <S%H310><s%> us, that we might do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him with our burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and with our sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and with our peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>; that your children <S%H1121><s%> may not say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to our children <S%H1121><s%> in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, Ye have no part <S%H2506><s%> in the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> we, that it shall be, when they should so say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to us or to our generations <S%H1755><s%> in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, that we may say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> again, Behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which our fathers <S%H1><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, not for burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, nor for sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>; but it is a witness <S%H5707><s%> between us and you.

'Elohim forbid <S%H2486><s%> that we should rebel <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8800><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> for burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, for meat offerings <S%H4503><s%>, or for sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, beside the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> his tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And when Pinchas <S%H6372><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> which were with him, heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, it pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H5869><s%> them.

And Pinchas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, This day <S%H3117><s%> we perceive <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> us, because ye have not committed <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>: now <S%H227><s%> ye have delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And Pinchas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and the princes <S%H5387><s%>, returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, and from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and brought <S%H7725><s%> them word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And the thing <S%H1697><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H5869><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and did not intend <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> against them in battle <S%H6635><s%>, to destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> wherein the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> and Gad <S%H1410><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> Ed: for it shall be a witness <S%H5707><s%> between us that the YY <S%H3068><s%> is 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
